title: Conduct a Satellite Vibration Test
description: A satellite must be subjected to intense vibrations on a shaker table to ensure it can survive the violent forces of a rocket launch.

tasks.description: Mount the satellite onto the shaker table.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent ensures the satellite is securely mounted.

tasks.description: Run the shaker table through a vibration profile that simulates the launch environment.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent operates the shaker table according to the test plan.

tasks.description: After the test, perform a full functional check on the satellite to verify that no components were damaged.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent runs a functional test and confirms the satellite is still fully operational.
